description: The proposed tender is for the supply of all necessary materials, labour, tools, supervision, and equipment for two types of Vacuum Truck services at the RCMP Depot Training Academy in Regina, Saskatchewan. Services are to be provided on an as required basis.
full_summary:
```
# **Government Tender Announcement**

**Tender Title:** Hydro Vacuum Truck and Regular Vacuum Truck Services, Regina SK

**Reference Number:** cb-831-85329582

**Amendment Number:** 1

**Solicitation Number:** M9424-24-1715/A

**Publication Date:** 2024-05-31

**Tender Closing Date:** 2024-07-02T16:00:00

**Region of Opportunity:** Worldwide

**Services Required:**
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is seeking a service provider to supply all necessary materials, labour, tools, supervision, and equipment for two types of Vacuum Truck services at the RCMP Depot Training Academy in Regina, Saskatchewan.

**Types of Services:**

*   Hydro Vacuum Truck Services: Equipped with a high-pressure water spraying system to spray water, break up soil, and suction water and debris to uncover underground utility pipes and cables.
*   Regular Vacuum Truck Services: Uses power to suction liquids and sludge from septic tanks, service pits, and holding tank pump outs without water spraying capability.

**Security Requirements:**
 All personnel working on site must hold a valid Facility Access with Escort (FA2) issued by the RCMP.

**Basis of Selection:**
 Responsive bids with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award.

**Bid Submission:**
Please submit your bid to NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca

**Language of Submission:**
Bids must be submitted in either official language of Canada, English or French.

**Tender Documents:**
Refer to the attached tender documents for further information.

**Indigenous Procurement:**
The federal Indigenous Business Directory (IBD) is an online resource to identify Indigenous business capacity.

**Important Links:**
Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
Canada will make available Notices of Proposed Procurement (NPP), bid solicitations, and related documents for download through the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.

**Contact Information:**
Procurement Officer
Qyitayo Ziwa,
Royal Canadian Mounted Police
NWR – Procurement
5600-11th Ave, Regina, SK. S4P 3J7
(306) 625-4151
``` 
I hope you make the best of the government tender announcement. Be sure to check out the many details on the Government
